subtemplate.unicode: This will clear all advice history, so advice already given will be repeated.

uientry.unicode: Determines scale of unit markers. At lowest setting, markers will be smaller and will not scale with distance, otherwise they will be larger and scale based on distance from camera.

Determines the behaviour of unit tooltips. By default, the tooltip will always be fully expanded. If set to "Delayed", a minimal tooltip will be used, expanding to the full tooltip after a short delay. If set to "Never", the minimal tooltip will always be used.
When enabled, unit groups will be locked by default when created in battle.||Locked groups preserve the relative positions and facing of their units, from the point at which the group was created.

state.unicode: Default to run when dragging units
When enabled, units will run after issuing a movement order via dragging with right-click. Units will move at the opposite speed when holding CTRL.

uientry.unicode: Trails make it easier to see missiles and their current path.

state.unicode: Trails make it easier to see missiles and their current path.

uientry.unicode: When enabled, units in battle will be coloured based on alliance to player instead of by faction colour, making them easier to distinguish.
Trails make it easier to see missiles and their current path.

state.unicode: Help markers show you where ships can disembark and where mountable artillery can be deployed.
Additional interface settings are available in battle when holding down the spacebar.
